text: Velleda callizona is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Louis Alexandre Auguste Chevrolat in 1855. It is known from Nigeria.BioLib.cz - Velleda callizona. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Phrissomini Category:Beetles described in 1855
title: Velleda callizona
